it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties

Class SharedProperty<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.Property<V>
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.SharedProperty<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value hold by the property.

    public class SharedProperty<V>
extends Property<V>
    A class for properties to be shared between targets implementing Replicating. The class automatically attach itself to new replicas thus rendering the wrapped property shared between these. Listeners are registered to the wrapped property. The class can be attached also to targets not implementing Replicating, but the automatic sharing behavior will not be enabled (on these).
    See Also:
    ReplicatingProperty

      • onReplicated

        protected void onReplicated(Replicating original,
                Replicating copy)
        This method is called when a PropertyTarget holding the property is replicated in order to attach this property to the replica and listen for its replications. Inherit this method to intercept replications and filter automatic registration of ReplicateListeners listener and attachment of this property.
        Parameters:
        original -
        copy -
